body_html:
This is self.pool:

self.pool = nn.MaxPool2d(kernel, stride_pool, return_indices=True)

The strange thing is that it returns this FloatTensor only sometimes. The only similar issue I could find was this one: #1197

I have this problem when using cuda as well as CPU. Do you maybe have any hints how to debug this?
body_text:
This is self.pool:
self.pool = nn.MaxPool2d(kernel, stride_pool, return_indices=True)

The strange thing is that it returns this FloatTensor only sometimes. The only similar issue I could find was this one: #1197
I have this problem when using cuda as well as CPU. Do you maybe have any hints how to debug this?
body:
This is self.pool:

```
self.pool = nn.MaxPool2d(kernel, stride_pool, return_indices=True)
```

The strange thing is that it returns this FloatTensor only sometimes. The only similar issue I could find was this one: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/1197

I have this problem when using cuda as well as CPU. Do you maybe have any hints how to debug this?
